steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the location where you want to insert the dynamic check box.
Click on the 'Developer' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Controls' group, click on the 'Legacy Tools' button.
From the drop-down menu, select 'Check Box Form Field'.
A check box will be inserted at the cursor position.
Right-click on the check box and select 'Properties' from the context menu.
In the 'Check Box Form Field Options' dialog box, customize the properties of the check box as needed.
Click 'OK' to close the dialog box.
Save the changes to the document.
